mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply ( reply_content, reply_status, member_id, post_id, created_date, updated_date) values (#{replyContent}, #{replyStatus},#{memberId},#{postId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.select: select re.id, re.reply_content, re.reply_status, re.created_date, re.updated_date, re.member_id, re.post_id, pf.profile_file_name, pf.profile_file_path, pf.profile_file_size, pf.profile_file_type, m.member_nickname, m.member_name from tbl_reply re left join tbl_member m on re.member_id = m.id left join tbl_profile pf on re.member_id = pf.member_id where post_id = #{postId} and reply_status = 'VISIBLE' order by created_date desc limit #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount}
select count(*) from tbl_reply where post_id = #{postId} and reply_status = 'VISIBLE'
